value.title: AI cannot be recognised as an inventor, US rules
value.excerpt: The US Patent and Trademark Office rejected two patents where the AI system Dabus was listed as the inventor, in a ruling on Monday. US patent law had previously only specified eligible inventors had to be "individuals".

There are several things about how Tesla is approaching self-driving technology that makes it different from the rest of the auto industry and tech companies developing the technology.
